name: Interaction Rules
description: Interaction patterns, behaviors, and constraints extracted from Microsoft Loop UI analysis

rules.name: Single Selection
rules.description: Click item to select, deselects previous selection
rules.behavior: Only one item can be selected at a time
rules.visualFeedback: Selected item has distinct background color or border

rules.name: Multi-Selection
rules.description: Checkbox-based selection allowing multiple items
rules.behavior: Click checkbox to toggle selection, multiple items can be selected
rules.visualFeedback: Checked checkboxes and selected row background
interactions: Click individual checkbox → Toggle that item
Click header checkbox → Select/deselect all visible items

rules.name: Focus Visible
rules.description: Keyboard focus must be clearly visible
rules.behavior: Focused element shows outline or border
rules.styling: 2-3px outline with accent color, offset by 2px

rules.name: Focus Trap
rules.description: Keep focus within modal or panel
rules.behavior: Tab cycles through focusable elements within container, does not escape

rules.name: Hover Feedback
rules.description: Visual change on mouse hover to indicate interactivity
rules.behavior: Subtle background color change, shadow increase, or opacity change

rules.name: Active State
rules.description: Visual change when element is pressed/clicked
rules.behavior: Darker background, pressed appearance, or scale reduction

rules.name: Disabled State
rules.description: Visual indication that element is not interactive
rules.behavior: Reduced opacity (40-60%), grayed out colors, no hover effect

rules.name: Hover Actions
rules.description: Additional actions appear on hover
rules.behavior: Action buttons fade in or slide in on hover
rules.position: Right side of list items or corners of cards

rules.name: Single Click
rules.description: Primary interaction for most elements
rules.behavior: Execute action or navigate
rules.feedback: Active state, then navigation or state change

rules.name: Double Click
rules.description: Secondary interaction for inline editing
rules.behavior: Enter edit mode or open detail view

rules.name: Right Click
rules.description: Open context menu with actions
rules.behavior: Show menu at cursor position with relevant actions

rules.name: Long Press (Touch)
rules.description: Touch equivalent of right-click
rules.behavior: Show context menu after 500-800ms press

rules.name: Touch Target Size
rules.description: Minimum size for touch interactions

rules.name: Tab Navigation
rules.description: Move focus between interactive elements
rules.behavior: Tab moves forward, Shift+Tab moves backward

rules.name: Arrow Key Navigation
rules.description: Navigate within lists, menus, or grids
rules.behavior: Up/Down for vertical lists, Left/Right for horizontal or tree navigation

rules.name: Enter Key
rules.description: Activate focused element
rules.behavior: Execute button action, follow link, or submit form

rules.name: Space Key
rules.description: Toggle or activate focused element
rules.behavior: Toggle checkboxes/switches, activate buttons, scroll page

rules.name: Escape Key
rules.description: Cancel or close current context
rules.behavior: Close modal, dismiss dropdown, cancel edit mode

rules.name: Global Shortcuts
rules.description: Application-wide keyboard shortcuts

rules.name: Content Editing Shortcuts
rules.description: Shortcuts for rich text editing

rules.name: Draggable Items
rules.description: Items that can be moved via drag
rules.behavior: Item follows cursor with reduced opacity (50-70%)
rules.feedback: Visual indication that item is draggable (handle icon or hover state)

rules.name: Drop Zones
rules.description: Valid areas where items can be dropped
rules.behavior: Highlight or border appears when draggable item hovers over
rules.feedback: Color change, border, or background highlight

rules.name: Drop Indicator
rules.description: Show where item will be placed
rules.behavior: Line or highlight showing insertion point

rules.name: Invalid Drop
rules.description: Feedback when drop is not allowed
rules.behavior: Cursor changes to not-allowed, drop zone does not highlight
rules.feedback: No visual change or red border/icon

rules.name: Cancel Drag
rules.description: Abort drag operation
rules.behavior: Press Escape or drag outside valid drop zone
rules.feedback: Item returns to original position with animation

rules.name: Column Sorting
rules.description: Sort table by column
rules.behavior: Click column header to sort ascending, click again for descending, third click to remove sort
rules.feedback: Arrow icon in header (↑ ascending, ↓ descending)

rules.name: Filter Application
rules.description: Apply filters to data set
rules.behavior: Select filter options, data updates in real-time or on Apply button
rules.feedback: Active filter badges/chips above data, filtered count

rules.name: Filter Removal
rules.description: Remove individual or all filters
rules.behavior: Click X on filter badge to remove, or 'Clear All' button
rules.feedback: Data updates to show unfiltered results

rules.name: Search Filtering
rules.description: Filter data by keyword search
rules.behavior: Type in search input, data filters in real-time
rules.feedback: Matching items remain visible, non-matching items hidden or grayed out

rules.name: Infinite Scroll
rules.description: Load more content as user scrolls
rules.behavior: When user scrolls near bottom, load next batch of items
rules.feedback: Loading spinner at bottom, smooth insertion of new items

rules.name: Pagination
rules.description: Navigate between pages of data
rules.behavior: Click page number or Previous/Next buttons
rules.feedback: Active page highlighted, data updates to show new page
rules.controls: Page numbers, Previous/Next, Rows per page selector

rules.name: Scroll to Top
rules.description: Quickly return to top of page
rules.behavior: Click button to smoothly scroll to top

rules.name: Smooth Scrolling
rules.description: Animated scroll instead of instant jump
rules.behavior: Smooth animation when scrolling to anchor or element

rules.name: Inline Validation
rules.description: Validate input as user types or on blur
rules.behavior: Show error message and styling when input is invalid
rules.timing: On blur or after typing stops (debounced)
rules.feedback: Red border, error icon, error message below input

rules.name: Form Submission
rules.description: Submit form data
rules.behavior: Click submit button or press Enter in input
rules.feedback: Loading state on button, disable form during submission
rules.success: Success message or navigate to next view
rules.error: Error message, focus first invalid field

rules.name: Auto-Save
rules.description: Automatically save changes
rules.behavior: Save changes after typing stops (debounced) or on blur

rules.name: Discard Changes
rules.description: Cancel form or editing
rules.behavior: Click cancel button or press Escape
rules.confirmation: Show confirmation modal if changes are unsaved
rules.feedback: Return to previous state or view

rules.name: Entrance Animations
rules.description: Elements animate in when appearing
rules.behavior: Fade in, slide in, or scale in

rules.name: Exit Animations
rules.description: Elements animate out when disappearing
rules.behavior: Fade out, slide out, or scale out

rules.name: Transition Animations
rules.description: Smooth transitions between states
rules.behavior: Animate property changes (color, size, position)

rules.name: Loading Animations
rules.description: Indicate loading or processing state
rules.behavior: Spinner rotation, skeleton pulse, progress bar movement

rules.name: Micro-Interactions
rules.description: Subtle animations for feedback
rules.behavior: Button press, checkbox check, toggle switch slide

rules.name: Reduced Motion
rules.description: Respect user preference for reduced motion
rules.behavior: Disable or minimize animations if user has set prefers-reduced-motion

rules.name: Visual Hierarchy
rules.description: Use size, weight, and color to establish importance

rules.name: Color Restraint
rules.description: Limit accent color usage to maintain impact
rules.rule: Maximum 1-2 accent color elements per view

rules.name: Whitespace Usage
rules.description: Use spacing to group and separate content

rules.name: Progressive Disclosure
rules.description: Show only essential information, hide details until needed
rules.behavior: Reveal additional content on user action (click, hover, expand)

rules.name: Immediate Feedback
rules.description: Provide instant visual feedback for user actions
rules.behavior: State change, animation, or message appears immediately

rules.name: Success Feedback
rules.description: Confirm successful action completion
rules.behavior: Success message, checkmark icon, or green color
rules.display: Toast notification, inline message, or modal

rules.name: Error Feedback
rules.description: Inform user of errors or failures
rules.behavior: Error message, X icon, or red color
rules.display: Inline message, toast notification, or modal
rules.persistence: Remains until user corrects error or dismisses

rules.name: Confirmation Dialogs
rules.description: Request user confirmation for destructive actions
rules.behavior: Show modal with action description and confirm/cancel buttons

rules.name: Optimistic UI
rules.description: Show result of action immediately, revert if fails
rules.behavior: Update UI instantly, sync with server in background
rules.revert: If server returns error, revert UI and show error message

rules.name: Presence Indicators
rules.description: Show which users are currently active
rules.behavior: Avatar with colored indicator (online, away, busy, offline)
rules.position: Next to content items, in headers, in user lists

rules.name: Live Cursors
rules.description: Show where other users are editing
rules.behavior: Colored cursor with user name label

rules.name: Conflict Resolution
rules.description: Handle simultaneous edits by multiple users
rules.behavior: Automatic merging of non-conflicting changes, notification for conflicts
rules.resolution: Last write wins, or manual resolution interface

rules.name: Activity Feed
rules.description: Show recent actions by team members
rules.behavior: List of recent edits, comments, or changes

rules.name: Screen Reader Support
rules.description: Ensure all content is accessible to screen readers
requirements: ARIA labels for all interactive elements
Live regions for dynamic content updates

rules.name: Color Contrast
rules.description: Ensure sufficient contrast for readability
requirements: WCAG AA minimum: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text
WCAG AAA preferred: 7:1 for normal text, 4.5:1 for large text

rules.name: Color Independence
rules.description: Don't rely solely on color to convey information
requirements: Use icons, labels, or patterns in addition to color
Ensure information is conveyed through multiple means

rules.name: Text Sizing
rules.description: Ensure text is scalable and readable
requirements: Use relative units (rem, em) instead of fixed pixels
